title: How Fury Over Israel’s Qatar Attack Pushed Netanyahu on Gaza

summary: The Trump administration has tried to end deportation protections for more than 300,000 Venezuelan immigrants.

summary: Is it “fun” and an “unprecedented opportunity,” or is it “madness” that must end? Depends who’s talking.

title: Nutrition Program for Mothers and Infants May Run Out of Money Within Weeks
summary: Nearly 41 percent of U.S.-born infants participate in the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants and Children, which may not have enough funding for an extended government shutdown.

title: Canada Will Headline the Pacific Airshow in California Because of the Shutdown
summary: The government shutdown has prevented a U.S. Air Force group and possibly a Navy squadron from attending signature air shows in California. Instead, a Canadian team is set to be the headliner.

title: Rite Aid Closes Its Remaining Stores
summary: The company said it had closed its remaining 89 stores this week after struggling for years to stay in business and filing for bankruptcy protection twice.

summary: He played for the Ravens when the team won the Super Bowl in 2013.

title: Over $1 Million Bounty Is Found Off Florida Treasure Coast
summary: Treasure hunters found roughly 1,000 silver and gold coins off the east coast of Florida this summer. Many have visible dates and mint marks.
